data.title: Official Website of the State of Delaware
data.meta_description: The official website of the State of Delaware. Find information about state government, programs, and services. The First State is located in the Northeast U.S.
data.meta_site_name: delaware.gov - Official Website of the State of Delaware
data.text:
Notice of 2024 State Primary Election

Notice of 2024 State Primary Election: Tuesday, September 10, 2024, 7 a.m. to 8 p.m.

Only Delaware voters registered with the Democratic and Republican parties may vote in their party’s primary election.

Only Delaware voters who were automatically registered to vote at DMV through the automatic voter registration (AVR) process may change their party at a Primary Election Early Voting Site or their assigned Polling Place in order to vote in the State Primary Election.

Learn More

2024 State Primary Election Early Voting Notice

Delaware voters who are eligible to vote in Primary Elections may vote in person at any Early Voting Site in their county of residence during the 10-day Early Voting period prior to the September 10, 2024 State Primary Election Day.

Early Voting for the State Primary Election begins Wednesday, August 28, 2024.

Learn More

Delaware Paid Leave Is Coming

From Sept. 1 to Dec. 1, 2024 — Required employers can set up an account in our user-friendly Delaware Paid Leave management system. Once registered, employers will be automatically enrolled. Other employers, depending on their size, may voluntarily enroll for Delaware Paid Leave or request to use a private plan.

Starting Jan. 1, 2025 — Payroll deductions can begin for employers who require their employees to contribute to the cost of Delaware Paid Leave.

Learn More
